SCTX:
Begin ColonyApronia

short nolore
short following

if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_3" < 30 )
		Disable
	endif
endif

if ( GetDisabled == 1 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_3" >= 30 )
		Enable
	endif
endif

if ( following == 0 )
	if ( GetCurrentAIPackage == 3 )
		set following to 1
	endif
endif

if ( following == 1 )
	if ( GetDistance "Falco Galenus" <= 1024 )
		AiWander 512 0 0 40 20 20 0 0 0 0 0 0
		Journal CO_3b 20
		set following to 2
		ForceGreeting
	endif
endif

End ColonyApronia
